metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21238 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: PySAML2 is a pure python implementation of SAML Version 2 Standard. PySAML2before 6.5.0 has an improper verification of cryptographic signaturevulnerability. All users of pysaml2 that need to validate signed SAMLdocuments are impacted. The vulnerability is a variant of XML Signaturewrapping because it did not validate the SAML document against an XMLschema. This allowed invalid XML documents to be processed and such adocument can trick pysaml2 with a wrapped signature. This is fixed inPySAML2 6.5.0.

criterions.comment: python-pysaml2 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
